title: VR, AR, and Spatial Computing
content: 10+ years of experience involved in researching and prototyping new application paradigms, solving challenging and interesting challenges in the AR/VR/Spatial Computing space..

title: Native Mobile Applications
content: 10+ years of experience focusing on designing and developing full stack iOS applications and backend services, data explorers and visualizations, interactive installations, and games for adults and kids.

title: Experience Design and Development
content: 20+ years helping launch products with venture-backed startups, non-profits, and solo-entrepreneurs, and Fortune 20 companies like Google, Samsung, and Apple.
